abilities.name: Stages of Evolution
abilities.effect: As long as Hitmontop is an Evolved Pokémon, is your Active Pokémon, and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Hitmontop is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Upward Kick
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has at least 2 damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.
